News.Subtitle: Our first release!
Body: 【Base】 - Base on TOH: Enhanced v2.0.0 Canary 9.1 - Base on TOH: Optimized v1.3.1 【Crewmates】 - Telepath (Crewmate Power - By: Andries, Idea: Andries) 【Impostors】 - Hypnotist (Impostor Support - By: Andries, Idea: Andries) 【Neutrals】 - Memory Thief (Neutral Evil - By: Andries, Idea: Andries 【Credits】 - Andries (Discord: @andries_659) ★ Thank you for using Town of Host: Optimized Continued v1.0.0 ★
